code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{StoreContext}from"./StoreContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Wishlist=()=>{const{wishlist,removeFromWishlist}=useContext(StoreContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wishlist-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Your Wishlist \u2764\uFE0F"}),wishlist.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No items in wishlist."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"wishlist-grid",children:wishlist.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wishlist-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u20B9",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>removeFromWishlist(product.id),children:"Remove \u274C"})]},product.id))})]});};export default Wishlist;
